name: Champion Road
description:
Champion Road offers the opportunity to play with six different characters. Each fighter has unique special moves and attacks, but that's not all – each one has a story to uncover and exclusive stages to conquer. Initially, you can choose from Hiroshi, Miss Devil, and Pawat. However, by earning coins through completing the game, you can unlock the other three secret characters!


Champion Road combines the gameplay of classic action-platformers with the combat typical of arcade beat 'em ups from the 80s and 90s. Easy to pick up but extremely satisfying for those seeking action without frills. The tournament-style setting, reminiscent of classic Fighting Games, makes Champion Road unique in its concept!


In addition to the main mode, the game also offers exciting unlockable modes: 1vs1, Survival, and Art Gallery. Through the in-game store, you can unlock interesting extras such as additional palettes and unreleased sketches. Champion Road focuses on replayability and the charisma of its characters!


  • An incredible blend of beat 'em up and platform action!
  • 6 fighters, each with their own adventure and story to discover!
  • Use weapons to carve your way through enemies!
  • Unlock interesting extras by collecting coins during gameplay!
  • Extra modes: 1 VS 1, Survival, and Art Gallery!
  • Vibrant pixel art, mixes 8-bit aesthetics with the bright colors of arcade games!
  • Comic-style artwork drawn by Oscar Celestini!
  • Explosive soundtrack composed by Rusted Music Studio and Phat Phrog Studios!
  • Inspired by many old school games of the 80s and 90s!
